Armor-Piercing_Rounds.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
Armor-Piercing_Rounds.description: Deal an additional 20% damage to bosses.

Backup_Magazine.name: Backup Magazine
Backup_Magazine.description: add +1 charge of your Secondary skill.
Backup_Magazine.unlock: Fully charge a Teleporter without getting hit.

Bundle_of_Fireworks.name: Bundle of Fireworks
Bundle_of_Fireworks.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
Bundle_of_Fireworks.unlock: Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D Printer.

Bustling_Fungus.name: Bustling Fungus
Bustling_Fungus.description: After standing still for 2 seconds, create a zone that heals for 4.5% of your health every second to all allies within 3m.
Bustling_Fungus.stack: +2.25% more health healed, +1.5m to area of effect.

Cautious_Slug.name: Cautious Slug
Cautious_Slug.description: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s after not taking damage for 7 seconds.

Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.description: Deal +75% damage to enemies above 90% health.

Focus_Crystal.name: Focus Crystal
Focus_Crystal.description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20%.

Gasoline.name: Gasoline
Gasoline.description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m. Enemies burn for 150% base damage.
Gasoline.stack: +4m to area of effect, +75% base damage dealt.

Item_Scrap_White.name: Item Scrap, White
Item_Scrap_White.description: Does nothing. Consumed first when using a 3D printer of the same tier.

Lens-Makers_Glasses.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
Lens-Makers_Glasses.description: You attacks have a 10% chance to critically strike, dealing double damage.

Medkit.name: Medkit
Medkit.description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% of maximum health.

Monster_Tooth.name: Monster Tooth
Monster_Tooth.description: On Kill: Enemy spawns a healing orb that heals the player for 8 plus an additional 2% of maximum health.

Pauls_Goat_Hoof.name: Paul's Goat Hoof
Pauls_Goat_Hoof.unlock: Fail a Shrine of Chance 3 times in a row.

Personal_Shield_Generator.name: Personal Shield Generator
Personal_Shield_Generator.description: Gain a shield equal to 8% of your maximum health. Recharges after not taking damage for 7 seconds.

Repulsion_Armor_Plate.name: Repulsion Armor Plate
Repulsion_Armor_Plate.description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5. Cannot be reduced below 1.

Rusted_Key.name: Rusted Key
Rusted_Key.description: A hidden cache containing an item (80% chance Rare, 20% chance Legendary) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cahce consumes this item.
Rusted_Key.unlock: Defeat a Teleporter boss in under 15 seconds.

Sticky_Bomb.name: Sticky Bomb
Sticky_Bomb.description: 5% chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.
Sticky_Bomb.stack: +5% additional chance to attach a bomb.

Stun_Grenade.name: Stun Grenade
Stun_Grenade.description: 5% chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

Topaz_Brooch.name: Topaz Brooch
Topaz_Brooch.description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health.

Tougher_Times.name: Tougher Times
Tougher_Times.description: 15% chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.
Tougher_Times.stack: +15% more chance to block incoming damage.

Tri-Tip_Dagger.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
Tri-Tip_Dagger.description: 10% chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

Warbanner.name: Warbanner
Warbanner.description: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m. Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

AtG_Missile_Mk_1.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
AtG_Missile_Mk_1.description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% TOTAL damage.

Bandolier.name: Bandolier
Bandolier.description: 18% chance on kill to drip an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Berzerkers_Pauldron.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
Berzerkers_Pauldron.description: Killing 3 enemies within 1 second send you into a frenzy for 6s, increasing movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
Berzerkers_Pauldron.unlock: Complete a Teleporter event with less than 10% health.

Chronobauble.name: Chronobauble
Chronobauble.description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2 seconds.

Death_Mark.name: Death Mark
Death_Mark.description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from al lsources for 7 seconds.

Fuel_Cell.name: Fuel Cell
Fuel_Cell.description: Gain an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown by 15%.
Fuel_Cell.unlock: Pick up 5 different types of equipment.

Ghors_Tome.name: Ghor's Tome
Ghors_Tome.description: 4% chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.
Ghors_Tome.stack: +4% additional chance to drop a treasure.

Harvesters_Scythe.name: Harvester's Scythe
Harvesters_Scythe.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 health.

Infusion.name: Infusion
Infusion.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1, up to a maximum of 100 additional health.
Infusion.stack: +1 health gained on kill, +100 max health.

Item_Scrap_Green.name: Item Scrap, Green
Item_Scrap_Green.description: Does nothing. Consumed first when using a 3D printer of the same tier.

Kjaros_Band.name: Kjaro's Band
Kjaros_Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blast enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.
Kjaros_Band.unlock: Complete the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

Leeching_Seed.name: Leeching Seed
Leeching_Seed.description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 health.

Lepton_Daisy.name: Lepton Daisy
Lepton_Daisy.description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 time.

Old_Guillotine.name: Old Guillotine
Old_Guillotine.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% health.

Old_War_Stealthkit.name: Old War Stealthkit
Old_War_Stealthkit.description: Falling below 25% health gives you 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5 seconds. Recharges every 30 seconds.

Predatory_Instincts.name: Predatory Instincts
Predatory_Instincts.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%, with a maximum cap of 36% increased attack speed.

Razorwire.name: Razorwire
Razorwire.description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 targets in a 25m radius.

Red_Whip.name: Red Whip
Red_Whip.description: After not using skills for 5 seconds, boost movement speed by 30%.

Runalds_Band.name: Runald's Band
Runalds_Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blast enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3 seconds and dealing 250% TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.
Runalds_Band.stack: +3 seconds of freeze time, +250% damage dealt.
Runalds_Band.unlock: Complete the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

Squid_Polyp.name: Squid Polyp
Squid_Polyp.description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby at 100% attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.
Squid_Polyp.unlock: Purchase 6 Gunner Turrets in a single run.

Ukulele.name: Ukulele
Ukulele.description: 25% chance to fire chain lighting for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 targets within 20m.

War_Horn.name: War Horn
War_Horn.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8 seconds.
War_Horn.unlock: Activate 3 Shrines of Combat in a single stage and defeat all the spawned monsters.

Wax_Quail.name: Wax Quail
Wax_Quail.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m.

Will-o-the-wisp.name: Will-o'-the-wisp
Will-o-the-wisp.description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m radius for 350% base damage.

57_Leaf_Clover.name: 57 Leaf Clover
57_Leaf_Clover.description: All random effects are rolled 1 time for a favourable outcome.

Aegis.name: Aegis
Aegis.description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% of the amount you healed.

Brainstalks.name: Brainstalks
Brainstalks.description: Upon killing a monster, enter a frenzy for 4 seconds where skills have no cooldowns.
Brainstalks.unlock: Defeat an elite boss on Monsoon difficulty.

Brilliant_Behemoth.name: Brilliant Behemoth
Brilliant_Behemoth.description: All your attacks explode in a 4m radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

Ceremonial_Dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger
Ceremonial_Dagger.description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% base damage.

Defensive_Microbots.name: Defensive Microbots
Defensive_Microbots.description: Shoot down 1 projectile within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

Dios_Best_Friend.name: Dio's Best Friend
Dios_Best_Friend.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

Frost_Relic.name: Frost Relic
Frost_Relic.description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 600% damage per second, and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5 seconds. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 1m. Stacks up to 6m.

H3AD-5T_v2.name: H3AD-5T v2
H3AD-5T_v2.description: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion upon hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10,000% base damage that scales up with speed. Recharges in 10 seconds.

Happiest_Mask.name: Happiest Mask
Happiest_Mask.description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30 seconds.

Hardlight_Afterburner.name: Hardlight Afterburner
Hardlight_Afterburner.description: Add +2 charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

Interstellar_Desk_Plant.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
Interstellar_Desk_Plant.description: On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds. The plant heals for 10% of maximum health every second to all allies within 5m. Lasts 10 seconds.

Item_Scrap_Red.name: Item Scrap, Red
Item_Scrap_Red.description: Does nothing. Consumed first when using a 3D printer of the same tier.

Nkuhanas_Opinion.name: N'kuhana's Opinion
Nkuhanas_Opinion.description: Store 100% of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
Nkuhanas_Opinion.unlock: Find the Altar to N'kuhana in Wetland Aspect.

Resonance_Disc.name: Resonance Disc
Resonance_Disc.description: Kiling enemies charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage, piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage. Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage.
Resonance_Disc.stack: +300% additional flight damage, +1000% additional explosion damage.

Sentient_Meat_Hook.name: Sentient Meat Hook
Sentient_Meat_Hook.description: 20% chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
Sentient_Meat_Hook.stack: +20% additional chance to fire, +5 more enemies hooked
Sentient_Meat_Hook.unlock: Loop back to the first stage.

Shattering_Justice.name: Shattering Justice
Shattering_Justice.description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 seconds.

Soulbound_Catalyst.name: Soulbound Catalyst
Soulbound_Catalyst.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4 seconds.

Unstable_Tesla_Coil.name: Unstable Tesla Coil
Unstable_Tesla_Coil.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

Wake_of_Vultures.name: Wake of Vultures
Wake_of_Vultures.description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8 seconds.

Charged_Perforator.name: Charged Perforator
Charged_Perforator.description: 10% chance on hit to call down a lightning strike, dealing 500% damage.

Empathy_Cores.name: Empathy Cores
Empathy_Cores.description: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% damage per ally on your team.

Genesis_Loop.name: Genesis Loop
Genesis_Loop.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 seconds.
Genesis_Loop.stack: Recharge time divided by 2 + amount of stacks.

Halcyon_Seed.name: Halcyon Seed
Halcyon_Seed.description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% damage and 100% health.

Item_Scrap_Yellow.name: Item Scrap, Yellow
Item_Scrap_Yellow.description: Does nothing. Consumed first when using a 3D printer of the same tier.

Little_Disciple.name: Little Disciple
Little_Disciple.description: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

Mired_Urn.name: Mired Urn
Mired_Urn.description: While in combat, the nearest character to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

Molten_Perforator.name: Molten Perforator
Molten_Perforator.description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% damage each.

Planula.name: Planula
Planula.description: Heal from incoming damage for 15 points.

Queens_Gland.name: Queen's Gland
Queens_Gland.description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health.

Shatterspleen.name: Shatterspleen
Shatterspleen.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical striles bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% damage, plus an additional 15% of their maximum health.
Shatterspleen.stack: +400% explosion damage, +15% maximum health explosion damage.

Titanic_Knurl.name: Titanic Knurl
Titanic_Knurl.description: Increase maximum health by 40 and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s.
Titanic_Knurl.stack: +40 additional maximum health, +1.6 hp/s additional health regen.

Blast_Shower.name: Blast Shower
Blast_Shower.description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

Disposable_Missile_Launcher.name: Disposable Missile Launcher
Disposable_Missile_Launcher.description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 300% damage each.

Eccentric_Vase.name: Eccentric Vase
Eccentric_Vase.description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
Eccentric_Vase.unlock: Defeat the unique guardian of the Gilded Coast without and beacons deactivating.

Foreign_Fruit.name: Foreign Fruit
Foreign_Fruit.description: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.

Forgive_Me_Please.name: Forgive Me Please
Forgive_Me_Please.description: Throw a cursed doll that thriggers any 'On Kill' effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.

Fuel_Array.name: Fuel Array
Fuel_Array.description: After a short delay, cause an explosion for 300% of player health that is guaranteed to kill the player. Can be used to unlock REX in the Abyssal Depths stage. Found on the excape pod you land with.

Gnarled_Woodsprite.name: Gnarled Woodsprite
Gnarled_Woodsprite.description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be send to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.
Gnarled_Woodsprite.unlock: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

Gorags_Opus.name: Gorags Opus
Gorags_Opus.description: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

Milky_Chrysalis.name: Milky Chrysalis
Milky_Chrysalis.description: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.

Ocular_HUD.name: Ocular HUD
Ocular_HUD.description: Gain +100% Critical Strike chance for 8 seconds.

Preon_Accumulator.name: Preon Accumulator
Preon_Accumulator.description: After a short charge period, fire a slow-moving orb that zaps enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in a 20m radius explosion for 4000% damage.
Preon_Accumulator.unlock: Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta.

Primordial_Cube.name: Primordial Cube
Primordial_Cube.description: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds.

Radar_Scanner.name: Radar Scanner
Radar_Scanner.description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

Recycler.name: Recycler
Recycler.description: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one of the same tier. Can only be used on the target item once.
Recycler.unlock: Destroy 20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

Royal_Capacitor.name: Royal Capacitor
Royal_Capacitor.description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster for 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.
Royal_Capacitor.unlock: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines if the Mountain.

Sawmerang.name: Sawmerang
Sawmerang.description: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 400% damage each. Also deals an additional 100% damage/second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemes again on the way back.

Super_Massive_Leech.name: Super Massive Leech
Super_Massive_Leech.description: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.

The_Back-up.name: The Back-up
The_Back-up.description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Drones stay for 25 seconds.

The_Crowdfunder.name: The Crowdfunder
The_Crowdfunder.description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet, and cost increases over time.

Volcanic_Egg.name: Volcanic Egg
Volcanic_Egg.description: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.

Her_Biting_Embrace.name: Her Biting Embrace
Her_Biting_Embrace.description: Attacked enemies are slowed by 20% on hit. Slow duration is based on Proc Coefficient, with a base of 1.5 seconds. When the player dies while holding this, they will explode for 150% damage ina addition to freezing nearby enemies.
Her_Biting_Embrace.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.

Ifrits_Distinction.name: Ifrit's Distinction
Ifrits_Distinction.description: Grants a fire train that follows the player that ignites enemies. Burn duration is based on Proc Coefficient, with a base of 4 seconds.
Ifrits_Distinction.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.

Nkuhanas_Retort.name: N'kuhana's Retort
Nkuhanas_Retort.description: Player periodically release 3-4 spiked balls that sprouts spikes from where they land. Spikes will nullify the target's healing.
Nkuhanas_Retort.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.

Shared_Design.name: Shared Design
Shared_Design.description: Attacks will cripple on hit, and occasionally fire five bomb projectiles at enemies. Gain 30% movement speed, as well as all health replaced with shields, with an additional 25% maximum health.
Shared_Design.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.

Silence_Between_Two_Strikes.name: Silence Between Two Strikes
Silence_Between_Two_Strikes.description: 50% of the players health is replaced with shields and attacks attach lighting bombs which explode after a short period, dealing 50% TOTAL damage.
Silence_Between_Two_Strikes.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.

Spectral_Circlet.name: Spectral Circlet
Spectral_Circlet.description: Grants a large aura which grants invisibilty to any ally. Attacks apply a slow on hit.
Spectral_Circlet.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.

Beads_of_Fealty.name: Beads of Fealty
Beads_of_Fealty.description: When the player enters the Celestial Portal to enter 'A Moment, Fractured' and obliterates themself at the Obelisk, they will be transported to 'A Moment, Whole' instead of dying.

Brittle_Crown.name: Brittle Crown
Brittle_Crown.description: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 gold. Scales over time. Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% of the maximum health percentage you lost

Corpsebloom.name: Corpsebloom
Corpsebloom.description: Heal +100% more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% of your health per second.
Corpsebloom.stack: +100% more healing, +50% reduced max hp healed per second.

Defiant_Gouge.name: Defiant Gouge
Defiant_Gouge.description: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby. Scales over time.

Essence_of_Heresy.name: Essence of Heresy
Essence_of_Heresy.description: Replace your Special Skill with Ruin. Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 seconds.
Essence_of_Heresy.stack: +10 additional Ruin seconds, and +8 seconds additional skill recharge.
Essence_of_Heresy.unlock: Kill 15 Bosses in a single run.

Effigy_of_Grief.name: Effigy of Grief
Effigy_of_Grief.description: All characters wihtin are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5.

Focused_Convergence.name: Focused Convergence
Focused_Convergence.description: Teleporters charge 30% faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% smaller.
Focused_Convergence.stack: +30% faster charge speed, -50% Teleporter zone size.
Focused_Convergence.unlock: In 4 consecutive stages don't leave the Teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

Gesture_of_the_Drowned.name: Gesture of the Drowned
Gesture_of_the_Drowned.description: Reduces Equipment cooldown by 50%. Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
Gesture_of_the_Drowned.unlock: Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map.

Hooks_of_heresy.name: Hooks of heresy
Hooks_of_heresy.description: Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom. Charge up a projectile that deals 175% damager per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 seconds. Recharges after 5 seconds.
Hooks_of_heresy.stack: +3 seconds root time, +5 seconds skill recharge time.
Hooks_of_heresy.unlock: Kill 15 Bosses in a single run.

Glowing_Meteorite.name: Glowing Meteorite
Glowing_Meteorite.description: Rain meteors from teh sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.
Glowing_Meteorite.unlock: Carry 5 Lunar Items in a single run.

Hellfire_Tincture.name: Hellfire Tincture
Hellfire_Tincture.description: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12 seconds. Deal 5% of your maxumim health per second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.

Mercurial_Rachis.name: Mercurial Rachis
Mercurial_Rachis.description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m, causing them to deal +50% damage.

Purity.name: Purity
Purity.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 seconds. All random effects are rolled 1 time for an unfavourable outcome.
Purity.unlock: Beat the game on Monsoon difficulty.

Shaped_Glass.name: Shaped Glass
Shaped_Glass.description: Increase base damage by 100%. Reduce maximum health by 50%.

Spinel_Tonic.name: Spinel Tonic
Spinel_Tonic.description: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%, attack speed by +70%, armor by +20, maximum health by +50%, passive health regen by +300%, and movespeed by +30%. When the tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all your stats by -5%.
Spinel_Tonic.unlock: Discover and enter three unique portals.

Strides_of_Heresy.name: Strides of Heresy
Strides_of_Heresy.description: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade. Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% of your maximum health. Lasts 3 seconds.
Strides_of_Heresy.stack: +25% maximum health healed, +3 additional seconds in Shadowfade.
Strides_of_Heresy.unlock: Kill 15 bosses in a single run.

Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% maximum health.

Visions_of_Heresy.name: Visions of Heresy
Visions_of_Heresy.description: Replace your Primary Skills with Hungering Gaze. Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, deaing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges that reload after 2 seconds.
Visions_of_Heresy.stack: +12 stored charges, +2 seconds to recharge time.
Visions_of_Heresy.unlock: Kill 15 bosses in a single run.
